description: Allows you to purchase a reserved node offering. Reserved nodes are not eligible for cancellation and are non-refundable.

parameters.name: ReservedNodesOfferingId
parameters.description: The ID of the reserved node offering to purchase.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tags to be added to this resource. A tag is a key-value pair. A tag key must be accompanied by a tag value, although null is accepted. (dict) --- A tag that can be added to an MemoryDB resource. Tags are composed of a Key/Value pair. You can use tags to categorize and track all your MemoryDB resources. When you add or remove tags on clusters, those actions will be replicated to all nodes in the cluster. A tag with a null Value is permitted. For more information, see Tagging your MemoryDB resources Key (string) --- The key for the tag. May not be null. Value (string) --- The tag's value. May be null.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key for the tag. May not be null.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The tag's value. May be null.

nested_items.name: ReservedNode
nested_items.description: Represents the output of a PurchaseReservedNodesOffering operation.

nested_items.name: ReservationId
nested_items.description: A customer-specified identifier to track this reservation.

nested_items.name: ReservedNodesOfferingId
nested_items.description: The ID of the reserved node offering to purchase.

nested_items.name: NodeType
nested_items.description: The node type for the reserved nodes.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The duration of the reservation in seconds.

nested_items.name: FixedPrice
nested_items.description: The fixed price charged for this reserved node.

nested_items.name: NodeCount
nested_items.description: The number of nodes that have been reserved.

nested_items.name: OfferingType
nested_items.description: The offering type of this reserved node.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the reserved node.

nested_items.name: RecurringCharges
nested_items.description: The recurring price charged to run this reserved node.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeAmount
nested_items.description: The amount of the recurring charge to run this reserved node.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeFrequency
nested_items.description: The frequency of the recurring price charged to run this reserved node.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the reserved node.
